    "myDefaultIncludePath": [
      "${workspaceFolder}/**",
      "${env:USERPROFILE}/.conan/data/**"
    ]
  },
  "configurations": [
    {
      "name": "Win32",
      "includePath": [
        "${myDefaultIncludePath}"
      ],
      // "forcedInclude": ["${workspaceFolder}/include/config.h"],
      "forcedInclude": ["${env:USERPROFILE}/.conan/data/**"],

      "cStandard": "c11",
      "cppStandard": "c++14",

        "path": [
          "${workspaceFolder}"
        ],
        "limitSymbolsToIncludedHeaders": true
      }
    }
  ],
